topic.title: The true price of Bitcoins as of today 1,095,238 and why.
topic.body:
This calculation is based on public records searchable.

Therefore, my calculations are estimates and may fluactuate on a daily basis ! 

Global wealth 273 trillions 
Global debt 250 trillions 
Global real (nominal	)wealth 23 trillions 
(273t-250t=23t)

They are 21.000.000 (millions) to be mined by year 2140

(23tÃ·21m=1,095,238)

After the Reset, the Global wealth will be represented in Bitcoins available at the time. 

(U. S. DEBT as we speak 23 trillions, coincidence?) 

2nd scenario would be to represent 90% of the Global wealth in Bitcoins and the other 10% in Gold, Silver and other assets) that would still make 1 Bitcoin worth ~900,000 per coin. 

Elites know and hide the plan. 

*all estimates 

Feel free to take part in the discussion.

Twitter Hack is to discredit Bitcoins, an inside Job
topic.body: by the one, who controls the narrative since dawn.

1578105095_1G79HnSxfCixN2HD2jP1Zabs1B8xz.body:
> [quantumkitty](#comment_327_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEaQbNZu): Rather than worrying about money, worry about producing the things that money buys. Gold would be useless in an uninhabited island.

On an uninhabited island, you don't need anything but yourself and opposite sex to reproduce and living off mother nature.

> [thetruth](#comment_52_1G9k2b4cSRzZSfLQuzxmpJB3LT3GfgTQUQ): MONEY is just a little tiny part of the EQUATION ...but you need something of value for the next move.

Agreed to your equation analogy. 
Many people don't see the bigger picture, they are narrow minded to the core.

> [totaldarkness](#comment_8_1KRJTDNcfHhogWdZRoMSkfS1FZoCCPvjer): Basically this.  You can't eat gold, silver or Bitcoin.  You'd better learn to be completely self sufficient, and / or have useful things to bring to the bartering table.

Absolutely, once there are two or more people involved in an exchange, a more standardised medium of exchange will be needed and will arise.

> [zaron](#comment_57_193HCur1fDFo7RoPUnQ1poMMexP4M9tbcU): eh, the signs have been there for thousands of years.. still skidding into the endzone

We are experiencing the PAST, PRESENT AND FUTURE at the same time :-)
